title: Strategic Alliance and New Product Development Success Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Business Administration Knowledge or Introductory Marketing Understanding
context.additional_context: Focuses on analyzing real corporate cases to understand the interconnection between strategic alliances and new product development processes, combining online discussions and offline workshops.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core activities of strategic alliances: scanning, orchestrating, and learning
Learners can establish product innovation strategies based on market environment analysis and competitive intensity
Learners can case-based evaluate the correlation between decision-making flexibility and alliance consistency in new product development
Learners propose solutions to real-world business problems through team-based projects in blended learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
